question: You are a code expert. Please use your professional knowledge to generate accurate and professional responses. Make sure the generated code is executable when possible. Create an HTML page using Bootstrap V5 that resembles the Tencent Yuanbao client's AI response interface (with functionality for uploading files and images).

checklist.title: Is the basic Tencent Yuanbao AI interface structure implemented correctly?
checklist.description: Verify if the code includes the essential UI components of Yuanbao client: header with branding, sidebar for navigation/chat history, main conversation area, input field with send button, and file/image upload controls. Score 0 if the interface is completely different, 5 if it has basic resemblance but missing key elements, 10 if all major components match the Yuanbao interface layout.

checklist.title: Is the file and image upload functionality properly implemented?
checklist.description: Check if the upload functionality includes: file input controls, preview capability for images before upload, file type validation, progress indicators, and proper error handling for rejected files. Deduct 3 points if preview functionality is missing, 3 points if there's no validation for file types/sizes, and 4 points if error handling is absent. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is Bootstrap V5 used correctly and efficiently?
checklist.description: Evaluate proper usage of Bootstrap V5 components and utilities: grid system for responsive layout, appropriate use of cards/modals/dropdowns, proper spacing utilities, and responsive breakpoints. Deduct 3 points for using deprecated Bootstrap 4 features, 2 points for excessive custom CSS that could be handled by Bootstrap utilities, and 5 points if responsive design is not implemented. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the chat/response interface functional and interactive?
checklist.description: Assess if the interface allows for displaying AI responses with proper formatting, shows user/AI distinction visually, handles different message types (text, code, images), and provides interaction feedback. Deduct 3 points if message formatting is not implemented, 4 points if there's no visual distinction between user and AI messages, and 3 points if there's no interaction feedback. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the code robust?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the code can handle common abnormal situations (such as large file uploads, server errors, unsupported file types, etc.) and provide friendly error prompts or recovery mechanisms. Code with strong robustness should be able to effectively handle these edge cases, giving 10 points. If the robustness is average, give 5 points, and if no exceptions are handled, give 0 points.

checklist.title: Are there any innovative features that are eye-catching?
checklist.description: Check whether the code includes surprise features that enhance the experience (e.g., 1. Voice input capability 2. Message reactions/emojis 3. Theme switching between light/dark modes). Add 3 points for each practical innovative feature implemented (maximum 10 points).

checklist.title: Are there any redundant features?
checklist.description: Strictly check three types of redundancy: 1. Redundant implementation of similar functions (e.g., multiple ways to upload files) 2. Function modules unrelated to an AI chat interface (e.g., a built-in game) 3. Fancy effects that affect performance (e.g., excessive animations). Deduct 3 points for each redundancy found, and directly deduct 10 points if the core functions are interfered with by redundant code.

checklist.title: Does the code have engineering quality?
checklist.description: Review modular design (such as separating UI/logic/API calls), clean HTML structure, appropriate use of JavaScript best practices, and code organization. Deduct 5 points if global namespace pollution is found; deduct 3 points if there's inline styling instead of proper CSS classes; deduct 2 points if the HTML structure is overly nested or doesn't follow semantic principles. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Does the interface vision meet professional design standards?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the overall design follows modern design principles: 1) Harmonious color matching that matches Tencent's brand colors 2) Proper layout spacing (element spacing follows the 8px multiple principle) 3) Professional font system (body font size ≥ 14px, line height over 1.5 times). Deduct 3 points for each crowded visual element, 5 points for inconsistent color scheme with Tencent Yuanbao, and 5 points for chaotic text-image layout. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the dynamic interaction smooth and seamless?
checklist.description: Judge whether the dynamic effects conform to human perception characteristics: 1) Click feedback delay ≤ 100ms 2) Transition animation duration controlled between 300-500ms 3) Clear visual focus guidance for upload actions. Deduct 5 points for each operation without feedback, 3 points for jarring transitions when uploading files or receiving responses, and 5 points if important controls like the upload button aren't prominently visible. The full score is 10 points.
